mapper.update:
update damage_repository_device
damage_repository_device.create_time = #{createTime},
damage_repository_device.device_code = #{deviceCode},
damage_repository_device.device_name = #{deviceName},
damage_repository_device.device_type = #{deviceType},
damage_repository_device.device_type_code = #{deviceTypeCode},
damage_repository_device.factory = #{factory},
damage_repository_device.nature = #{nature},

damage_repository_device.seal_number = #{sealNumber},

damage_repository_device.track_no = #{trackNo},
damage_repository_device.turnout_no = #{turnoutNo},
damage_repository_device.update_time = #{updateTime},
damage_repository_device.user_date = #{userDate}
where damage_repository_device.order_detail_id = #{orderDetailId}
